The policy is to not accept any changes to the inflections list for backwards compatibility reasons. Please use `config/inflections/initializer.rb` to add any custom inflections you need:
@@@ ruby # config/initializers/inflections.rb ActiveSupport::Inflector.inflections do |inflect| inflect.irregular 'save', 'saves' end @@@

end
